NLP Pipeline

  • View page source

Deployment (src/deployment)

This module enables deployment of the emotion classifier to cloud environments such as Azure or Kubernetes.

Azure ML Deployment

  • Uses Azure ML SDK to register and deploy the model

  • Submits score script and environment YAML

Kubernetes Endpoint Deployment

  • Wraps model in a FastAPI container

  • Prepares for deployment to AKS, GKE, or other Kubernetes clusters

Score Script

src.deployment.score.init()[source]

Initialize the model, tokenizer, and label encoder for emotion classification.

Loads all necessary components from the Azure ML model mount directory.

src.deployment.score.run(raw_data)[source]

Perform emotion prediction from a JSON input string.

Parameters:

raw_data (str) – A JSON-formatted string containing a “text” field.

Returns:

Dictionary with keys:

  • ”text” (str): The input text.

  • ”predicted_label” (str): Predicted emotion label.

  • ”confidence” (float): Confidence score of the prediction.

  • or “error” (str): Error message if input is invalid.

Return type:

dict

Required for Azure ML endpoints. Loads the model and returns predictions based on input schema.

File Structure

src/
└── deployment/
    ├── cloud_deploy.py
    ├── deploy_kubernetes_endpoint.py
    ├── score.py
    └── deployment_README.md
